comment_output_directory: Optional: Global output directory for all generated PPTX files. Can be overridden per task. Default is current directory.
comment_model_version: Model version to use for video generation. Options: 'v1.6', 'v2.1'. Default is 'v2.1' if not specified.

schedule.comment: Time format: HH:MM (24-hour format). Leave empty to start immediately

tasks.prompt: The main character stands up first. Suddenly, large fluttering white angel wings appear, adding a pure, graceful aura to the look as the camera gradually straight zooms in. Soft white feathers begin to gently fall from the wings, drifting slowly through the air. A warm, radiant glow surrounds her body, casting soft light flares and sparkling particles in the background. The feathers have a soft, rich texture and shimmer with subtle highlights under the glow. The outfit hugs the body naturally and flows slightly as the character shifts pose, with the wings and falling feathers gently moving in sync with her motion. She completes the transformation by striking a confident pose with one hand resting on her hip, ​
tasks.negative_prompt: transition, do a spin, spinning, turn around, turn to the side, blurry arms, fog on body, clip through, wings on the chest, break model, split wings, back view, asymmetrical wing, outfit changed, multi people, blurry, pixelated, wrong outfit design, wrong fabric texture, missing black wings, wings with wrong color, wings too small, wings floating awkwardly, deformed wings, stiff or broken wings, deformed body, duplicated limbs, low resolution, awkward pose, background too cluttered, bad lighting,  back view​
